about.intro: I am a dedicated Information Technology undergraduate with a passion for solving complex problems through innovative technology solutions. I am eager to be a part of an organization or company that will enrich my potentials, build my character and utilize my knowledge and skills in the best possible way for achieving the organization's goals.

features.title: Problem Solver
features.text: I thrive on identifying challenges and developing solutions.

features.title: Team Collaborator
features.text: Strong communication skills and teamwork experience.

features.title: Fast Learner
features.text: Adaptable and quick to master new technologies.

features.title: Innovative Thinker
features.text: I enjoy exploring new ideas and creative solutions.

features.title: Organization and Time Management
features.text: I excel at managing my time effectively and staying organized.

education.course_strand: Bachelor of Science in Information Technology
Bachelor of Science in Information Technology (3rd year)

projects.title: Gig Application (Java and MySQL Programming)
projects.description: A platform for live music streaming built with Java, MySQL, and JDBC. Features DAO pattern for database operations and MVC architecture.

projects.title: Creative Corner (Java Networking Project)
projects.description: This project uses Java RMI Structure following a client-server architecture, allowing users to create art commission with detailed specifications

projects.title: Boggle Word Game(Java CORBA Project)
projects.description: A multiplayer word game based on Boggle, built with Java using CORBA architecture and MySQL database. Players compete in timed rounds to form words from random letters, with the first to win three rounds declared the winner.

projects.title: Boggle Word Game(Python CORBA Project)
projects.description: A multiplayer word game based on Boggle, built with Python using CORBA architecture and MySQL database. Players compete in timed rounds to form words from random letters, with the first to win three rounds declared the winner.

projects.title: Network Architecture (A Term Project)
projects.description: Developed a detailed network infrastructure and basic security plan, including equipment and hardware selection, cost estimation, wiring layouts for all the network equipment, security measures, and space allocation for a hypothetical company building as part of an IT course final project on network fundamentals.

projects.title: Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning in Cybersecurity (A Term Project)
projects.description: Detailed analysis of machine learning applications in cybersecurity, including threat detection algorithms and ethical considerations.

projects.title: Artificial Intelligence for Enhanced Cybersecurity (A Term Project)
projects.description: A mini literature review on the applications of AI in cybersecurity, particularly in the financial sector.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A portfolio website built with Bootstrap 5, HTML, and vanilla JS featuring dynamic content loading and smooth animations.

projects.title: CTF Write-Up for Photo Stock (Kaspersky)
projects.description: Guide on how I found the bug and got the flag from the hosted instance.

exposure.title: Kaspersky CTF 2025
highlights: Participated in an international competition CTF event hosted by Kaspersky.
Placed 29th out of 716 participants from various schools and organizations across the Asia-Oceania region.
Placed 5th in ranking in the Philippines.

exposure.title: Trend Micro uCTF Challenge
highlights: Participated in the uCTF competition hosted by Trend Micro Philippines.
Placed 56th out of 199 participants from various schools across the Philippines.
